question:
Consider the following statements about the Indian Regional Navigation Satellite System:
  1. It is a constellation of seven satellites
  2. It aims to provide accurate real-time positioning and timing services over India and region extending to 1500 km around the country
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
Both are correct statements
The Indian Regional Navigation Satellite System, operational name NAVIC, is an independent regional navigation satellite system being developed by India. It is designed to provide accurate real-time positioning and timing services over India and region extending to 1500 km around India. Two basic types of services provided by IRNSS are Standard Positioning Service (SPS), which is provided to all the users and Restricted Service (RS).
